topic.title: DITA Validate and Check For Completeness

body.p: The Validate and Check For Completeness action that is available in the toolbar of the DITA Maps Manager view provides the ability to validate a DITA map with a large array of settings. The settings dialog box has an Export settings button that can be used to export the settings to an XML configuration file. Once the settings are exported you can use the scripts/validateCheckDITA script to run validation on a DITA Map and report the results in a separate XML document.

A public example of using such a script as a GitHub action for reporting errors in pull requests on DITA project can be found here: . The GitHub action calls a Gradle script target named runValidation: .
